text: TheCable is an independent news source in Lagos, Nigeria. It was founded by Simon Kolawole in 2014 and published by The Cable Newspaper Ltd established on 2011. ==Activities== In 2023, TheCable launched an app to aid people with defect read news. ==Related pages== * Newspapers published in Nigeria ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Newspapers published in Nigeria
title: TheCable
